description:
Here are the log files that contain errors even though all of the tempest tests passed. There are still flaky failures in this tests suite and it is much harder to diagnose when there are spurious ERRORs when nothing is wrong. We should be failing the gating tests if ERROR shows up in the log. This is also an issue for system monitoring. An ERROR in a log file should mean there is an OpenStack bug, or an operator configuration error.


n-api: Many stacktraces
n-cpu: Many stacktraces
n-net: Seems to be one error repeated many times
title: Successful full gate jobs show ERRORs and stacktraces

comments.content:
Here are the log files that contain errors even though all of the tempest tests passed. There are still flaky failures in this tests suite and it is much harder to diagnose when there are spurious ERRORs when nothing is wrong. We should be failing the gating tests if ERROR shows up in the log. This is also an issue for system monitoring. An ERROR in a log file should mean there is an OpenStack bug, or an operator configuration error.


n-api: Many stacktraces
n-cpu: Many stacktraces
n-net: Seems to be one error repeated many times
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content:
One of the challenges is figuring out which tests were triggering these particular stack traces, and whether or not it's repeatable with a smaller number of tests.

Was chatting with mtreinish on possibly coming up with another nova extension like his coverage extension which would let tempest inject a log message in all the nova services every time a test is started / completed, so that we can more accurately track down which tests are triggering the scenarios here.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content:
I filed a bunch of bugs, one for each class of stacktrace:

https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1084707
https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1084706

https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1084698
https://bugs.launchpad.net/cinder/+bug/1084711
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content: This bug is too general to be acted on. I'm marking invalid and creating specific stack trace bugs with stacktrace tag for the ones still open.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
